summary: Most requested UI polish items are implemented (AdminLayoutShell spacing + footer restyle, KPI card readout redesign, ConfirmDialog restyle, WorkerRateSettings title/input styling, and header avatar component). However, the diff summary does not provide sufficient evidence that the Settings tabs container/card widening and Select dropdown readability fixes are actually applied within SystemSettingsSection, and the required placeholder avatar PNG asset is not shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enlarge the main white content card under the Settings tabs and group the Settings tab buttons inside a clearer rounded, bordered container in the Settings view (AdminLayoutShell + SystemSettingsSection).
missing_requirements.reason: AdminLayoutShell content container is widened/padded, but the diff summary for SystemSettingsSection is truncated and shows no explicit changes to TabsList/TabsTrigger container styling or a dedicated rounded/bordered tabs container. Therefore there is no clear evidence the tabs are visually grouped “inside the box” as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix Select/dropdown readability in Settings (no blurry/cut-off options; correct overlay/stacking; consistent padding/font/line-height for SelectTrigger/SelectContent) in SystemSettingsSection and similar admin settings selects.
missing_requirements.reason: CSS utility classes for admin select styling were added, but the diff summary does not show SystemSettingsSection (or other settings selects) actually using these classes on SelectTrigger/SelectContent. With SystemSettingsSection truncated, there isn’t enough evidence the dropdown readability/stacking issue is fixed in the Settings UI itself.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the generated default avatar placeholder image as a static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference it for the admin header avatar fallback (no backend serving).
missing_requirements.reason: AdminHeaderAvatar references '/assets/generated/admin-avatar-placeholder.dim_128x128.png', but the diff summary does not show the image file being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Use branding logo (branding.logoDataUrl) as an additional fallback for the admin header avatar when no profile photo exists.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-4/REQ-8 specify showing stored profile photo when available, otherwise a default placeholder image. Falling back to the branding logo is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added admin-specific profile photo storage helpers/keys (ADMIN_PROFILE_PHOTO_KEY, getAdminProfilePhoto, setAdminProfilePhoto).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request only mentions reusing the existing profile photo storage approach and adding a placeholder asset; it does not request adding a separate admin profile-photo storage key/API.
